game.name: Leap up no Justu: Double
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam Cloud, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Leap up no jutsu: Double is the next version of the game Leap up no Jutsu. From now on, you must control two characters to avoid obstacles at the same time by clicking on the side where the character needs to jump.Enjoy!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Leap up no jutsu: Double is the next version of the game Leap up no Jutsu. From now on, you must control two characters to avoid obstacles at the same time by clicking on the side where the character needs to jump.Enjoy!
